name: Bonds
description: Robin is a student in college who has always had a secret interest in being tied up. One day she decides to challenge her roommate and childhood friend, Alicia, to tie her up after they watch a movie featuring a poorly tied damsel in distress.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 2 GB available space
